Text: RE National Bank of Canada Cc Tana I have spoken with Christine Hanna we are looking into it Thanks Monica Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Wednesday October PM To Reasoner Monica Gonzalez Veronica Cc Rohauer Tanya Otto Randy Subject National Bank of Canada I just had a voice mail from Christine at National Bank of Canada wanting to make a margin call and not knowing who here to call Can someone please call her Her number is Thanks
